Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-CoV-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Panther Fusion SARS-CoV-2/Flu A/B/RSV multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of respiratory viruses in NP and AN swabs, including adaptive crosstalk correction software update.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV nucleic acids from NP and AN swab specimens in symptomatic individuals to aid differential diagnosis of respiratory infections; not intended to detect influenza C.
